items.title: I am Learning Python and Node.JS!
items.summary: I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you…
items.content_html:
I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you are just going to have to live with my VB.NET software, sorry.

But with python I can make neat little applications. Don't judge me for the code below, as I am just learning the language.

user_age = input("Enter your age: ")
user_name = input("Enter your name: ")
print("Hi, " + user_name + "! You are " + user_age + "-years-old")

This currently is my most basic understanding of Python.

So, yeah, I'm working on it.

items.title: TheCrafters001 Direct has ended
items.summary: So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct
items.content_html:
So, I am sorry to say this, but after long consideration, I have decided to kill off TheCrafters001 Direct

The reason being is that I never really updated it. But hey, I am going to look on the bright side, I am learning Python, and am going to learn how to use Node.JS using a couple of tutorials on YouTube. Specifically the "Node.js A to Z" by James Murphy and the "Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners" by freeCodeCamp.org. But until I complete them, you are just going to have to live with my VB.NET software, sorry.

items.title: Support Email Fully Functional.
items.summary: Hi! My support emails have been setup properly, and are now fully functional! To view them you can go to the Contact Me page and scroll down to Email Support!
items.content_html: Hi! My support emails have been setup properly, and are now fully functional! To view them you can go to the Contact Me page and scroll down to Email Support!

items.title: New Project: EasyInno.
items.summary: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.
items.content_html: EasyInno is a simple IDE that allows you to make Inno Setup Scripts with ease! More about the project will be revealed as the project is being worked on.

items.title: The Adventure of Block reset
items.summary: I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.
items.content_html:
I have decided to reset the "The Adventure of Block" project.

Reason

The reason why I have decided to do this, is because I am not very good at makeing assets for RPG Maker MV. I will use a lot of the default RPG Maker MV envirement sprites, but I will use some of my custom assets.

Sorry.

However, the current demo is still avaliable to play.

You can play it on the Games page.

items.title: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
items.summary: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!
items.content_html: Flash Player 2 1.3.0.1 is the last version!1.3.0.1 is the last version of Flash Player 2. There will be no more updates.

items.title: Flash Player 2 - 1.3.0.1 - Minor Updates
items.summary: The changes include:Fixed a bug where you get an error for trying to run the Media PlayerFixed a help file link
items.content_html:
The changes include:

  • Fixed a bug where you get an error for trying to run the Media Player
  • Fixed a help file link

items.title: Flash Player Two Version 1.3.0.0 released
items.summary: An update for Flash Player Two has been released.
items.content_html:
An update for Flash Player Two has been released.

The following changes include:

  • Updated help files
  • Added Help link to Media Player Controller
  • Added 64 Bit support
  • Updated Copyright Year
